Package cosc202.andie

package cosc202.andie
  • Class
    Description
    Andie
    Main class for A Non-Destructive Image Editor (ANDIE).
    BrightnessAndContrast
    Image Operation to change the brightness and contrast of given image.
    ColourActions
    Actions provided by the Colour menu.
    ConvertToGrey
    ImageOperation to convert an image from colour to greyscale.
    CustomException
    A custom exception class for creating exceptions specific to the operations of ANDIE.
    CustomException.CustomCode
    Enumeration of the types of exception.
    EditActions
    Actions provided by the Edit menu.
    FileActions
    Actions provided by the File menu.
    FilterActions
    Actions provided by the Filter menu.
    FlipImageHorizontal
    An action that enables the image to be flip horizontally.
    FlipImageVertical
    An action that enables the image to be flip vertically.
    GaussianBlur
    A filter that apply gaussian blur to image.
    ImageAction
    Abstract class representing actions the user might take in the interface.
    ImageOperation
    Interface for operations to be applied to images.
    ImagePanel
    UI display element for EditableImages.
    ImageTransformations
     
    MeanFilter
    ImageOperation to apply a Mean (simple blur) filter.
    MedianFilter
    ImageOperation to apply a Median filter.
    ResizeOperation
     
    RotateImageAntiClockwise
    An action to rotate an image anti-clockwise.
    RotateImageClockwise
    An action to rotate an image clockwise.
    SharpenFilter
    A filter that sharpens an input image.
    SoftBlur
     
    Toolbar
    A class to create and output a toolbar, with functions like open, save, export, undo, redo.
    ViewActions
    Actions provided by the View menu.
